Cover and chill.How would you rate Sour Cream Dressing?Leave a ReviewTell us what you thinkReviews (3)Back to TopTriangleSo easy. Works great with any citrus. Perfect for burrito bowls!Lauren Ali Orange,  California 3/5/2021Very tasty, but I would also recommend using less salt. I made it with grapefruit instead because I had no lemons on hand - delicious. walEMinneapolis 6/18/2020Super tangy but creamy.  Yet still a light, bright flavor.  Only thing is that I would def. reco reducing S&P to 1tsp at most. Anonymous900774/20/2020Explore Bon AppétitCondimentQuickEasyGluten-FreeNut-FreeVegetarianKetoRecipes you want to make.
